description:
Keep the water where it should. Designed to keep you dry on your next tour or sea kayak, the Excursion comes 3 sizes to fit a variety of cockpits. Constructed from Level Six eXhaust™ waterproof-breathable nylon, the sea stays out and your lower body still gets to breathe.

  • Waterproof breathable 2.5 layer material
  • Supple 0.5mm neoprene waistband
  • Removable suspenders keep the tunnel in place
  • Adjustable tunnel uses wide elastic for comfort
  • Adjustable implosion bar
  • Webbing grab handle makes it easy to get out
  • Mesh pocket for snacks and small necessities
  • Durable bungee rand secures the skirt to the boat
  • Reflective piping helps keep you seen on low-light crossings
  • Cockpit fit range L x W– small: 63.5-71cm x 40.5-45.5cm, medium: 71-78.5cm x 40.5-45.5cm, large: 78.5-86cm x 40.5- 45.5cm
name: Level Six Excursion Spray Skirt - Unisex
